content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day December 14, 2020 Anatomy of an Attack Evasive Zoom phishing campaign using multiple phishing techniques at once December 14, 2020 Anatomy of an Attack Evasive Zoom phishing campaign using multiple phishing techniques at once In the final days of November, Cyren Inbox Security detected a massive phishing attack with a fake Microsoft 365 login page. Interestingly, they used many techniques to make the attack more evasive.
